title: New: Blaenavon – Lonely Side
body:
One of my favourites from the forthcoming debut album from **Blaenavon**, out on Friday.

These lads will always have a special place close to my heart. Check out _Lonely Side_ below, and pick up a copy of That’s Your Lot on Friday.

excerpt.full: One of my favourites from the forthcoming debut album from Blaenavon, out on Friday. These lads will always have a special place close to my heart. Check out Lonely Side below, and pick up a copy of That’s Your Lot on Friday.
excerpt.short: One of my favourites from the forthcoming debut album from Blaenavon, out on Friday.
